attributes.additional_details:
To whom this may concern,

Hillcote is a residential respite care unit for disabled individual's it has been running for thirty years, hundreds of children have been through the doors of Hillcote over the years, and benefited from there brilliant services and care.

Unfortunately Wiltshire Council are purposing to close the doors in April next year.

 Please support and sign this petition to save Hillcote and future residents, you can find out more on the save Hillcote face book page. Thank you for your time.
